law.catch_line: Within three months after receipt of the proposal, the Secretary shall report to the Nature Conserva...
law.text: Within three months after receipt of the proposal, the Secretary shall report to the Nature Conservancy his recommendations as to the suitability or nonsuitability of the proposal in relation to the State's program of open space or wildland areas, with copies to the Board of Public Works, the President of the Senate, and the Speaker of the House of Delegates.
